transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Hello ha good morning.
Executive: Ha comment technology se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ji ji kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ha acha hai dekho aap aap aap kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu sir aapke customer aaya hua tha ki aapne tenders ke regarding jankari chahiye thi.
Customer: Ha tenders ke regarding dala tha humne.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Wo abhi abhi do saal se paisa bhar rahe hain IndiaMART pe to ek ek order us tarah se ek ye nahi mila hai humko.
Executive: Acha acha dekho sir hamare abhi 70000 to dala hai humne.
Executive: Main main bata deti hu aapko aapka naam Kedarnath hai?
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ha to main ye batana chah rahi hu sir ki IndiaMART dekho teen char tarike se business provide karta hai ki aap agar hamara service use karte hain 100% service use karenge sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To hum by lead bhi provide karte hain direct inquiry provide karte hain usi ke users agar acha hai to direct call ka ratio badhta hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Theek hai sath mein hum tenders bhi provide karte hain tenders mein kya hota hai ki jo aapko tenders waha pe dikhta hai sir waha pe contact karenge to jaise aap contact kar doge to aapki jo registered mail id hai jo aapne IndiaMART mein register ki hui hai usko ek mail jata hai wo us pe aata hai aap wo pura mail padhiye form fill karne ko dete hain form fill kariye uske baad pura padhne ke baad wo ek aapko revert pahunchega jab aap wo form fill kar loge uski date over ho jayegi sabka form fill ho jayenge.
Customer: Oye to abhi wo form bhej do uska kuch to mail id.
Executive: Main nahi bhejungi main nahi bhejungi.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ye aap jab contact karoge na to direct aapke pass form aayega sir mere hath mein nahi hai form bhej.
Customer: Okay okay okay humko contact karna padega.
Executive: Contact kar doge ha jab aap click kar loge to aapke hi mail id pe wo pahunchega usko aapko open karke uska form fill karna hoga tab ja ke aap tenders pura padho uska form fill karo fir jab uski deadline khatam ho jayegi tab agar revert hoga to aapke pass pahunchega.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Jab wo tender bhi aap contact kar lete ho to wo bhi aapka by lead se minus hota hai agar aapko sir lagta hai thoda bahut ki ha kahin aapko kuch need hai main aapko thoda sa guide bhi kar deti hu dekho sir main manti hu ki aapko thoda business nahi mil paya hai aap se maine photos ke liye bhi bola tha shayad aaj hi subah mein message aaya hai mere pass ki main aapko photo bhej deta hu.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Hai na to abhi tak mere pass photo aaye nahi hai sir aap mujhe photo bhi share kar do to main wo ek do photo jo aap bol rahe ho mujhe wo main ek bari yaha pe add on kar deti hu baat rahi product ki sir aap ek bari mere sath agar online aaoge jyada samay nahi lungi main paanch se 10 minute.
Customer: Ha main abhi tak aaya nahi hai aur ek do ghante baad aapka naam kya bola aapne?
Executive: Aapka naam kaise hai waise?
Customer: Vinay.
Executive: Vinay Vinay ji main ye cheez aapko batana chahungi sir ki agar aap thoda sa bhi mujhe paanch se 10 minute pure din mein agar aap dete ho ek bari aap online aa jao to main thoda sa aapko guide kar dungi.
Customer: Okay okay main thoda system on karke call karta hu aapko ha.
Executive: Aap mera number likh lo sir ye wala number nahi hai mera aap mera number likh lo.
Customer: Okay ek ek minute ha ha to gadi aali tum the padto ki hai.
Customer: Gadi amchi aali the padto.
Customer: Hmm the padto ki hai.
Customer: Ha hello.
Executive: Ha number likh lijiye sir hello.
Customer: Hmm ye number nahi hai kya aapka?
Executive: Nahi ye number nahi hai.
Customer: Ek ek minute ha ek minute.
Executive: Hello ha likh batao sir likh lijiye.
Customer: Ek ek minute.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ji 7565.
Customer: 75.
Executive: Ha 7565.
Customer: 65.
Executive: Ha 883 ek minute sir ek minute line pe rahega.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha likh liya sir.
Customer: Ha boliye abhi kya likh liya maine 7565.
Executive: 883.
Customer: 883.
Executive: 665.
Customer: 665 7565.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: 883.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: 665.
Executive: Ha aur kuch janna chahte hain aap tenders.
Customer: Naam kya hai aapka?
Executive: Preeti.
Customer: Preeti aapka number rahega mere pass.
Executive: Wo wala number to sir aapke pass hai but ye jo hai na mera official number hai sir ye wale aapko koi bhi dikkat ho jaise aap tenders kabhi puchna chah rahe the na to aap mere hi number pe aur baki jo ye concern hai aapka tender ka aapko aur kuch puchna hai tender ke liye.
Customer: Nahi nahi pehle main on karta hu aur baad mein call karta hu aapko ha.
Executive: Ha to ye aapka concern main close karu sir aage.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Jo concern open kiya tha aapne ki mujhe tenders ke bare mein janna hai to ye aapko jankari mil gayi hai main concern close karu aapka.
Customer: Close mat karo main dekhta hu na ek bar check karta hu.
Executive: Chalo to kitni der mein main call karoge aap ek do ghante mein theek hai main do ghante wait kar leti hu sir fir isko concern hum close karte hain aap online aa jana.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: The person you
summary:
Concerns:

- Has not received orders in 2 years.

- Wants information about tenders.

- Needs help with photos for profile.



Resolution:

- Explained IndiaMART provides business in multiple ways.

- Explained the tender process and form filling.

- Offered to guide the customer online.

- Provided her official contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will turn on system and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, buyleads, subscription, photos
